GSD.description:
ALSA: usb-audio: Fix an out-of-bounds bug in __snd_usb_parse_audio_interface()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.213 by commit 0492798bf8dfcc09c9337a1ba065da1d1ca68712. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ALSA: usb-audio: Fix an out-of-bounds bug in __snd_usb_parse_audio_interface()
